title: Leading men 's hair coloring brands in the U.S. 2019
summary: The Leading men Brand in the hair coloring was Brand Just_For_Men_Control_GX , who made 138.0 million .
The most men Brand was Softsheen-Carson_Dark_&_Natural , with just 0.1 million .

In second place was Brand Just_For_Men_Autostop with 27.2 million ; third place went to Brand Just_For_Men with 138.0 million ; fourth place went to Brand Grecian_5 with 0.1 million and fifth place went to Brand Just_For_Men_Touch_of_Gray , who was 9.7 million .

data.Brand: Just For Men Touch of Gray

gold: In 2019 , Just For Men was the leading men 's hair coloring brand in the United States with sales of approximately 138 million U.S. dollars . Ranked second , the Just For Men Autostop brand generated sales of around 27.2 million U.S. dollars that year .
